data.comment: Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva starts the match. Pacos Ferreira with the kick-off in Funchal.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Douglas Tanque for Pacos Ferreira drives towards goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Funchal Nacional drive forward through Witi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 4, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Nacional.
Pedrao is booked for the home team.
In the minute 8, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pacos Ferreira's Luiz Carlos breaks free at Estadio da Madeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
In Funchal, Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Nacional.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Important block from the Nacional defence as Luiz Carlos fires in a strike for Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Luther Singh gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 16, Free kick Nacional.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Pacos Ferreira pushes forward through Douglas Tanque, whose finish on goal is saved.
Daniel Guimaraes has recovered and rejoins the match in Funchal.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva.
In the minute 19, The match at Estadio da Madeira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Daniel Guimaraes, who is down injured.
In the minute 20, Pacos Ferreira are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kenji Gorre (Nacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Nacional's half.
In the minute 28, Joao Amaral (Pacos Ferreira) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Pacos Ferreira are coming forward and Douglas Tanque gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards Nacional a goal kick.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a Nacional throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 36, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pacos Ferreira's Bruno Costa is on target but unsuccessful.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira needs to be cautious. Nacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Witi for Nacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Funchal.
In the minute 45, Nacional are whistled for offside.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Nacional just outside Pacos Ferreira's area.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Nacional with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Kenji Gorre (Nacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Freire (Nacional) is making a first substitution, with Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan replacing Vincent Thill.
Larry Azouni is replacing Nuno Borges for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
In the minute 48, Nacional have been awarded a corner by Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pacos Ferreira defender.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
In the minute 49, Nacional advance rapidly upfield but Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva blows for offside.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Nacional's Ruben Micael misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva.
Douglas Tanque's header is off-target for Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Brayan Riascos.
In the minute 57, Great play from Witi to set up the goal.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Funchal to check on Brayan Riascos, who is grimacing with pain.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 59, Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
The away team have replaced Joao Amaral with Helder Ferreira. This is the first substitution made today by Pepa.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva waits before resuming play because Brayan Riascos for Nacional is still down.
Brayan Riascos returns to the field for Nacional after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 64, Pacos Ferreira attack but Douglas Tanque's header doesn't find the target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 66, Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nacional.
Joao Camacho of Nacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Dor Jan is on a sub for Bruno Costa for Pacos Ferreira.
Pepa is making the team's third substitution at Estadio da Madeira with Mohamed Diaby replacing Luiz Carlos.
In the minute 70, Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a throw-in for Nacional, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Nacional.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards Nacional a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Dor Jan's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 75, Stephen Eustaquio grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio da Madeira.
Dor Jan instrumental with a fine assist.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Nacional's half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Nacional.
Marcelo (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 78, Marcelo hits the post with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Pacos Ferreira in Funchal.
Douglas Tanque for Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In the minute 78, Joao Victor is replacing Kenji Gorre for the home team.
Pepa (Pacos Ferreira) is making a fourth substitution, with Adriano replacing Luther Singh.
Pacos Ferreira make their fifth substitution with Uilton replacing Fernando Fonseca.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pacos Ferreira drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 88, Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
The home team replace Ruben Micael with Gergely Bobal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Nacional's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva.
At Estadio da Madeira, Pacos Ferreira are penalized for being offside.
Nacional are caught offside.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio da Madeira and Mohamed Diaby gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nacional defence.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Hugo Serafim Coelho Magalhaes Silva.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
